restrict: ◎第一階段需人工加選◎第二階段需人工加選◎加退選階段需人工加選 ◎必須先修過【英文(一)】
description: 共同科英文（二）課程為一學期兩學分課程，係為非英語系學生所開設的課程。目標在幫助大一學生活用中學時期所累積的英語知識，提昇英語聽、說、讀、寫整體的溝通能力。為達此目標，本課程要求教師盡量用英語上課，努力營造一個豐富的英語環境，讓學生不但有充分機會以英語參與課堂活動，且樂於使用英語與同學及老師溝通。
goals: 1. 增進學生英語溝通表達能力 2. 透過參與課程活動促進團隊精神 3. 透過多面向英語閱讀促使學生了解多元文化，拓展學生國際化視野 4. 透過課堂討論培養批判精神 5. 提升學生英語學習動機及自主學習興趣
syllabus: This course is designed to support students in their use of English language in academic context. Through intensive and extended reading of text materials, engagement in production activities, and practice at the Self-Learning Center, students are expected to acquire communication strategies for reading, listening, speaking, writing and critical thinking skills. Specifically, they will develop aural/oral fluency and autonomy, acquire note-taking skills in academic reading and writing, and use questioning strategies in group talks in person and online. Students are expected to collect miscellaneous works, including matrix worksheets and discussion notes, and present them in a portfolio for assessment by the end of the semester.
